website_summaries.verdict: Works great on 2-5 year-olds when powdered laxatives just won't do the trick.
pros: Package contains six applicators for liquid glycerin suppositories
Praised by parents who have exhausted all other methods
cons: May be painful for some children

customer_reviews.title: Too Big For Baby
customer_reviews.text: They work just fine, helped my little one get some relief and I loved that they are pre lubricated. BUT this is huge and not very comfortable to insert into a baby! I don't like the design of the tip at all. It's thick and just a weird shape overall. I wouldn't purchase this again and I recommend using some coconut oil and a frida baby gas passer instead. That or a little prune juice and water mix in a baby bottle. Don't recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Bboody

customer_reviews.title: Worked for adult when nothing else did!!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried these on my toddler yet but at 8 months pregnant I was completely desperate and tried this product on myself, worked in about 2 minutes and saved me from my agony!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J. Erwin

customer_reviews.title: A must for kids that are backed up!
customer_reviews.text: I keep these on hand all the time for my toddlers. Have been using these since they were babies. I only use these when it's an extreme scenario like they have been backed up for a few days at least. This will clear them out instantly. Easy to use and works within 1 - 10 minutes. Use lying down only! I made the mistake of trying to use it on my toddler while he was standing up and it dripped everywhere. Also wish the tip was softer or more rounded? Feels like the edge of the insertion tip is uncomfortable so I always swirl extra vaseline on it.
customer_reviews.author: jenerationmama

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old special needs son gets really bad constipated and I wasnt sure about buying these at ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old special needs son gets really bad constipated and I wasnt sure about buying these at first but I'm so glad I did. My son had been constipated for 3 going on 4 days and it worked almost instantly for him. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: bryanna

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolutely amazing! My toddler hadn't "gone" in about four days and was very constipated. We put this stuff in and within three minutes he went.....A LOT! It was amazing and painless I would recommend this product to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Nichi S.

customer_reviews.title: Work well for Constipated baby.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old gets constipated regularly and we have to use these. They work really well. I do with the tip was smaller.. I’m sure it’s wide for safety reasons but still .
customer_reviews.author: Jamiefay

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief!
customer_reviews.text: These work like a charm. Only used for emergency cases but they make kids go almost immediately after inserted. My son had horrible constipation problems the first 2 years of his life & we couldn’t keep him regular for nothing so these really came in hand!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It could be like half the thickness
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the applicator is too thick in my opinion. It could be like half the thickness. Especially considering its for small kids/babies. Would be better if it was in a syringe like applicator with a small tube.
customer_reviews.author: NotAMuggle

customer_reviews.title: Good results
customer_reviews.text: Why did I have to rate flavor? Lol Do Not Eat this! Works within 10 minutes or less.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Meyer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever used for my 5 month old. But I do not use entire tube. Works instantly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used for over a year when my son is constipated and Works good and right away
customer_reviews.author: Shionda evans

customer_reviews.title: Does the Trick!!
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month daughter suffers from occasional constipation. When nothing else works these ALWAYS do the trick. I only use 1/2 of a bulb and within 15 min she’s able to go. These have been a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: JamiKW

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for little one
customer_reviews.text: Works instantly. Libricated tip for comfort. A little difficult to get all liquid out so a lot can get waisted if not careful. Otherwise a life saver for my little one! Will continue to purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: TARA DECKER

customer_reviews.title: Works in minutes
customer_reviews.text: Both my poor babes has constipation issues. These worked amazingly and within minutes. Feels horrible to have to do to a 6 month old, but the relief it brought was instant!
customer_reviews.author: Marek White

customer_reviews.title: Works fast
customer_reviews.text: These work really fast and are easy to use. My only Complaint is how big the applicator is. But the medicine itself never fails, works fast and always makes my kiddo feel better. Way easier than the suppositories!
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Sun

customer_reviews.title: Get the Poops Out!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! When I see my little one is comfortable and struggling to get their poops out I use this. In our experience it works within 15 minutes (my kids are on the younger end of this product range).
customer_reviews.author: A. Hins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My great granddaughter literally screams when having to have a bowel movement. In this situation I use just part of one, and she can go. This works great for her!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rennie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: These worked so well for my daughter. Helps instantly and helps her to get out what is needed once and not all day long. Highly recommend for any parent whose child gets constipated
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Quattrocki

customer_reviews.title: Good help
customer_reviews.text: Works great. This is our last resource for a my daughter after 4 days with not bowels movements. Really do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Works good. but my son is the greatest enemy of
customer_reviews.text: Works good.but my son is the greatest enemy of it
customer_reviews.author: Love shopping

customer_reviews.title: Works well, bad syringe
customer_reviews.text: They do a good job at helping with constipation. But the end of the suppositories are blunt and big. I had to administer them using a different syringe.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Blake

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and makes it easy to go!
customer_reviews.text: These work like a charm within a minute for my daughter who suffers from constipation due to low tone!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: This is magic for my child who suffers with regular constipation. Produces bm within minutes of using!
customer_reviews.author: KRuss

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm!!!! 3 minutes max- and we have relief for our LO!
customer_reviews.author: TwinMomma

customer_reviews.title: Helpful to make the go easier
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help my toddler go to the bathroom. It helps and works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do the job instantly
customer_reviews.text: The really work fast. My toddler hates having it done but thankfully it works almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: bkgomez

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Work in minutes and easy to use ,I recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: AVP

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo easy and works in seconds. Little one hates it as would anyone having something slightly placed up their buttocks.
customer_reviews.author: Lele

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. My son doesn't appreciate insertion, AT ALL, but when he can't seem to get the poop out, this does the trick. I'm not going to lie, he hates it, but it definitely works.
customer_reviews.author: Traci S.

customer_reviews.title: wish the design was better.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get the medicine out sometimes. It works, but getting the medicine out of the bulb can be a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Socialbeck

customer_reviews.title: good to have in the medicine cabinet just in case ...
customer_reviews.text: Works 100% of the time, good to have in the medicine cabinet just in case my little girl is all stopped up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Duong

customer_reviews.title: Makes going much easier
customer_reviews.text: Relieved my 4 yr old within seconds. My 8 yr old nephew needed on the other day and it took a little ling but worked for him as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief
customer_reviews.text: Works within a few minutes of using it and is gentle

customer_reviews.title: Great for emergencies !
customer_reviews.text: I love these things for emergencies! It makes my son go in 5 minutes or less.
customer_reviews.author: Crisonis Marte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great for my little boy who refuses to go on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Messy Fam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sh*t!!
customer_reviews.text: Quite literally. My daughter has been holding her bms for a week at a time for months. She is uncomfortable and so nervous to go. No more! This was painless and fast! 4 minutes! Order these!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Law Family

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: We thought it wasn't delivered but it did)) thank you we always use tgis product its the best
customer_reviews.author: Eldor Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It is really helpful!!! What a relief for a baby
customer_reviews.author: Stanislav S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it works right the way for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Great product helps my 2 year old so much. He is a premature baby with Constipation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and work quickly
customer_reviews.text: We have lots of trouble with our almost 2 year old son getting constipated. These are very easy to use and work instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seal broken on medication box
customer_reviews.text: Package came with seal broken. Will be requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Willie J.

customer_reviews.title: Gooood and great
customer_reviews.text: Very good and easy to use and my child like it no pain atoll good buying
customer_reviews.author: Amani Alarada

customer_reviews.title: Works so fast! Within minutes. My 2 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Works so fast! Within minutes. My 2 year old gets a lot of issues and this does the trick in an emergency for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Christina M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend at all
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Dr Collins encopresis method, the tip that you insert is bigger than an adult enema from Walmart and is not smoothed over so it is very painful for them
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harris

customer_reviews.title: It Works, Be Patient
customer_reviews.text: It took longer than I expected considering other people said that their child pooped within minutes however my toddler has been holding in poops and she is very strong-willed so don't be discouraged it still worked none the less after little over an hour. I was just thankful she finally pooped. Good buy. It was definitely helpful considering all of the stress that came with her not pooping for like 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Kaplan

product_meta.title: Pedia-Lax Liquid Glycerin Suppositories, 6 Applicators (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description:
Size:Pack of 1Poop happens, but when it doesn't, there's Pedia-Lax. It's the first line of products for regularity and constipation relief made just for kids by the No. 1 trusted name in laxatives. And now Pedia-Lax Probiotic Yums help maintain natural digestive balance. Moms told us they were frustrated with the limited selection of products available to help relieve their children's constipation. So, as the nation's No. 1 laxative brand, our Pedia-Lax professors of Poopology got to work and created this complete line of safe, easy-to-use products for regularity and constipation relief, specially dosed for children.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
n/a
feature_bullets: Quick, gentle, and safe constipation relief that works in minutes
Works more quickly than traditional suppositories
